availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Charles Lady (Lyon / Caldwell co. farmer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Lavodia Catherine Bembrey Lady in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on July 15, 1847. Father of Charles E. Lady, Warrick F. Lady, George P. Lady, Frederick S. Lady, Bobbie E. Lady, Albert J. Lady, and Lily F. Lady. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 339A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 742-43.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 415A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 3, p. 70A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 2265.
Find A Grave, "Robert Charles "Bob" Lady (1825-1898)," Memorial #62163711, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/62163711 (accessed March 4, 2021).
